QuestData.Title: Waning Refuge
QuestData.Description: We have done all we can here.$b$bLet us get everyone into the boat and get out while we still can.$b$bWe have bought time for the others but nothing more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Leave Felsoul Advance on Deline's Gondola.
QuestData.RewardText: These people owe their lives to your bravery. They will not forget the risks we have taken for them.
